item.title: 3D-printed portal gun replica
item.description: Just finished my first large 3D-printing project. For sure I couldn’t pass by when I saw this amazing portal gun replica from @KirbyDowney_65 on Printables. Here I’d simply like to share some highlights and happy moments I had while doing it. I started by printing claws and assembling them, as they seemed the most fragile and tricky to assemble, but not so time-consuming when printing. A few more printing sessions and the remaining black parts are also done:
